name: Ladyrium
description:
🐞 Adventure into the microcosm of your biome in this real time strategy!🐞

-Click on your home to highlight the critters living in their mini world, then send them out to conquer more biomes as you strive to create an apex predator to showcase during the annual science fair!

- If the experiments go awry, be sure to use the calendar and loop back in time to run your experiment in optimal form. 

Be sure to take good notes and make your family proud!
